hero.title: Force Field
hero.subtitle: Secure Your Knowledge-System Inference Layer
hero.description: Force Field serves as the gateway to secure your knowledge-system inference layer. It intercepts prompts, enforces policies, monitors output and offers full auditability.

overview.title: What Is Force Field?
overview.description: Force Field is a security layer that sits between your users and your LLM-powered knowledge systems. It provides real-time protection against prompt injection, model manipulation, and knowledge leaks while maintaining full audit trails of all interactions.

steps.title: Intercept
steps.description: Force Field captures all prompts and inputs before they reach your LLM or knowledge system.

steps.title: Analyze & Enforce
steps.description: Applies your security policies, filters malicious patterns, and validates against governance rules.

steps.title: Monitor Output
steps.description: Inspects model responses for sensitive data leaks, hallucinations, or policy violations.

steps.title: Log & Audit
steps.description: Records every interaction with full context for compliance, debugging, and continuous improvement.

items.title: Prevent Prompt Injection
items.description: Detect and block adversarial inputs attempting to manipulate your AI systems.

items.title: Enforce Knowledge Policies
items.description: Control what information can be accessed, processed, and returned by your systems.

items.title: Maintain Audit Trails
items.description: Full visibility into every AI interaction for compliance and accountability.

items.title: Reduce Risk
items.description: Minimize exposure to model misuse, data leaks, and regulatory non-compliance.
